des: "Great mix - the powdered milk, sugar and creamer can be separated from the coffee and placed in a jar for a gift. Use any flavor of powdered non-dairy creamer to further flavor your cappuccino mix. Vary the amount of coffee granules to your taste. "
ins:
In a mixing bowl combine powdered milk, sugar, coffee creamer and instant coffee granules. Store in an air tight container.
To prepare beverage, stir 2 to 3 teaspoons of mix into 1 cup of hot water.
